CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 海；海洋；大海；内海；海面；海浪；波浪；大量；茫茫一片；一大片；海（天体上的广阔平原）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，可用复数形式表单数意义。sea所指的面积要比ocean小得多。sea也可是ocean的一部分。
指把海作为一个整体，是海洋的总称，不可数名词，指大洋时是可数名词。

bilingual.source: The sea level will rise as well.
The Old Man and the Sea by Hemingway.
The first is that the city is by the sea.
There's another castle in the middle of the sea.
When the sea freezes again, I will set out.
bilingual.target: 当海再次结冰时，我将出发。

bilingual.source: Purple flowers, green grass and blue sea.
bilingual.target: 紫色的花，绿色的草和蓝色的海。

bilingual.source: Its name is ‘Sea Queen' and it's red and white.
bilingual.target: 它的名字叫“海之女王”，是红白相间的。

list.abstract: Sea（别称大头海，1990年3月29日-），本名廉宝成，前韩国《星际争霸》职业选手。 在星际1时代，以自己优秀的基本功和良好的大局观赢得了“Bo1小王子”的称号。随后他转型星际争霸2，最终因成绩不理想而退役。
sea，英语单词，名词，作名词时译为“ 海；海洋；许多；大量”。

yingyinNormal.en: Sea bass! I'll have the sea bass!
yingyinNormal.zh: 海鲈！我想来份海鲈！

yingyinNormal.en: See, Han? The world's different above sea-level.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看吧，阿憨？海平面上的世界大不同啊。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to respect the sea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须得敬畏大海。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my gosh! Nemo's swimming out to sea!
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，糟了！尼莫正在游向海面！

yingyinNormal.en: Sun, Sea and Snow
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳，海和雪

yingyinNormal.en: Instead they farm the fish that's normally caught at sea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不借助一船一线，而是采用渔场养殖那些通常要从海里捕获的鱼。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, you old sea-dog, race you! Prepare to lose, water-hog!
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那我就来和你这个海狗比一场吧！准备好输吧，你这水猪。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's just check on the sea bass. The sea bass is lovely and it's cooked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们来看看海鲈鱼做得怎么样了。海鲈鱼看起来很棒，已经蒸熟。

yingyinNormal.en: If you put a shell to your ear, you could hear the sea. I can hear the sea. I love my seashell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把海螺放在耳朵旁边，就可以听到海了。我听到海的声音了！我好喜欢这个海螺。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm gonna be queen of the sea one day. I've learned the names of all the sea creatures.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，有一天我会成为海中的女王，我学过所有海洋生物的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: Fifteen hundred people went into the sea when Titanic sank from under us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 泰坦尼克号沉没时有一千五百人落海。

yingyinNormal.en: So just let that gently braise, and let the sea bass soak in those flavors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 文火慢炖，让海鲈鱼吸收酱汁的风味。

yingyinNormal.en: Now to go with the sea bass, I've got some wild rice and basmati rice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我用来给海鲈鱼配餐的，是菰米饭和印度香米饭。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm just going to place the sea bass here. Just let that plate cool slightly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先把海鲈鱼放在这里，把盘子稍稍放凉。

yingyinNormal.en: Lieutenant Dan, what are you doing here? Well, thought I'd try out my sea legs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丹中尉，你来做什么？嗯，我想到海中施展拳脚。

yingyinNormal.en: Who knows anything about New Orleans geography? Farkle. It's below sea level.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有谁熟悉新奥尔良的地理情况吗？弗科。它的地势比海平面低。

yingyinNormal.en: This sea of photovoltaic panels generates enough energy to power an average city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一片光伏面板之海产生的电力足以为一座中等规模的城市供电。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, let's look in more rock pools. What can you see? A seashell. Can you hear the sea in it? What do you mean?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，我们再去别的水潭看看。你们看到了什么？一个海螺。你能听到海声吗？什么意思啊？

yingyinNormal.en: One of the main gaps is the Columbia river valley, which is the only sea-level passage through the cascade mountains in the Pacific northwest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中主要一处是哥伦比亚河谷，这是太平洋西北部唯一一个横穿喀斯喀特山的海平面走廊。

yingyinNormal.en: My special ingredient for this dish is Chinese beer. This is really going to add a delicious sweetness and really compliment the sea bass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我做这道菜的秘密材料是中国啤酒，这会给菜肴带来一种美妙的甜味，很能衬托海鲈鱼的味道。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 水手；海员；水兵；航海能手；驾船高手；精通海事者

word_family.mean: n. 海；海洋；海浪；（SEA）单一欧洲法案

sense_info_list.en: a body of salt water not as large as an ocean and often nearly surrounded by land

examination_example.sentence: The islanders have built elaborate resorts, developed harbors and airfields, improved the beaches and have expanded <highlight>sea</highlight> and air routes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 岛民们建造了精致的度假村，开发了港口和机场，改善了海滩，并扩大了海上和空中航线。

word_usage.usage:
- go to sea 通常是 "开始做水手", 有时是 "开航"。
- go to the sea 是 "到海滨去 (度假) "。
- go into the sea 是 "到海里去"。
- run off to sea 是 "逃去做水手"。例如: He ran off to sea when he was young.
- put out to sea 是 "开航"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 海；海洋；海浪；（SEA）单一欧洲法案

sense_info_list.en: a body of salt water not as large as an ocean and often nearly surrounded by land

examination_example.sentence: His good luck charm sank into the <highlight>sea</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的幸运符沉入了大海。

examination_example.sentence: How to keep the village from sinking into the <highlight>sea</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何防止村庄沉入大海。

examination_example.sentence: The move is due to global warming and rising <highlight>sea</highlight> levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一举动是由于全球变暖和海平面上升。

sense_info_list.en: a large amount or number of something

word_usage.usage:
- go to sea 通常是 "开始做水手", 有时是 "开航"。
- go to the sea 是 "到海滨去 (度假) "。
- go into the sea 是 "到海里去"。
- run off to sea 是 "逃去做水手"。例如: He ran off to sea when he was young.
- put out to sea 是 "开航"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 水手；海员；水兵；航海能手；驾船高手；精通海事者

word_family.mean: n. 海；海洋；海浪；（SEA）单一欧洲法案

sense_info_list.en: a body of salt water not as large as an ocean and often nearly surrounded by land

examination_example.sentence: I was upset to learn that many <highlight>sea</highlight> animals eat plastic garbage, thinking it is food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我得知许多海洋动物把塑料垃圾当作食物来吃时，我很沮丧。

examination_example.sentence: I'm thinking of deep <highlight>sea</highlight> diving in Australia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想去澳大利亚深海潜水。

examination_example.sentence: We dance from Florida to Alaska, from north to south and <highlight>sea</highlight> to <highlight>sea</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直在跳舞，从佛罗里达到阿拉斯加，从北到南，从一个海到另一个海。

word_usage.usage:
go to sea 通常是 "开始做水手"，有时是 "开航"。
go to the sea 是 "到海滨去 (度假) "。
go into the sea 是 "到海里去"。
run off to sea 是 "逃去做水手"。例如：He ran off to sea when he was young.
put out to sea 是 "开航"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 海；海洋；海浪；（SEA）单一欧洲法案

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sea</highlight> levels will rise and many cities along the <highlight>sea</highlight> will disappear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海平面将上升，海边许多城市将消失。

examination_example.sentence: "This is my chance to learn about the problems <highlight>sea</highlight> turtles face and be a voice for these amazing animals," says Eddie.
examination_example.sentence_trans: "这是我了解海龟面临的问题并成为这些神奇动物的声音的机会，"埃迪说。

examination_example.sentence: The Hong Kong—Zhuhai—Macau Bridge, the world’s longest crosss—<highlight>sea</highlight> bridge, won another international prize in December, 2018.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 香港珠海-澳门大桥，世界上最长的十字路口-海桥，于2018年12月再次获得国际奖项。
